title: Lassen Volcanic National Park: Plan Your Visit
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit           Plan Your Visit       Lassen Volcanic National Park provides a wealth of fun activities that are as varied as the seasons of the park. Select a link below to learn more about planning your visit to Lassen. Foreign Language Brochures Spanish language brochure (pdf, 2.3KB) German language brochure (pdf, 1.4KB)  First-time Visitor? Learn more about Lassen Volcanic with the Explore the Undiscovered handout (pdf, 2.3MB) .
